DescriptionData.Title: Mehron All Pro Theatrical Kits - Fair Complexion (StarBlend) K110-F
DescriptionData.Description: Includes: step-by-step instructions, five full size StarBlend Cake makeup containers (Alabaster, Soft Peach, Natural Beige Blush, Light Cinnamon, Contour) (7 gm/color) , Black and Brown Pencil Liners, Colorset Powder (0.25 oz), 3 E.Y.E Creams (0.3 oz), L.I.P Cream, Hair White, Stage Blood (0.5 oz), Modeling Putty/Wax (0.5 oz), Crepe Hair, Spirit Gum (0.25 oz), Liquid Latex (1 oz), 2 Cosmetic Brushes, 2 Foam Sponges, 2 Stipple Sponges, Powder Puff, Powder Brush and Makeup Remover (1 oz).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each Mehron StarBlend Fair Theatrical Makeup Kit includes enough makeup for 50 - 70 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Mini-Pro Theatrical Makeup Kits - Dark Complexion KMP-B
DescriptionData.Description: The Mehron Mini-Pro Theatrical Make Up Kits include two base colors of Mehron CreamBlend Makeup to allow for greater flexibility in matching and creating varying skin tones. Each Mini-Pro Kit Theatrical Kit includes: step-by-step instructions, 5 color palette (Light Khaki 26, Rich Topaz 30, Light Cocoa 4C, Sable 7C, Ebony 10C) (7 gm/color), Colorset Powder (0.25 oz), Black Pencil Liner, Cosmetic Brush, 2 Non-Latex Triangular Foam Wedges and Powder Puff.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each Mehron CreamBlend Dark Theatrical Make Up Kit includes enough makeup for 10-15 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Mini-Pro Theatrical Makeup Kits - Med - Fair Complexion KMP-M
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Mini-Pro Student Theatrical Makeup Kits feature Mehron CreamBlend Makeup, used by professionals worldwide for their theatrical makeup supplies.
CreamBlend Stick is a highly pigmented, refined cream makeup base containing vitamins and antioxidants. CreamBlend Stick does to contain the petroleum base often found in traditional "greasepaint" makeup.
The Mehron Mini-Pro Kit Theatrical Kit includes two base colors of Mehron CreamBlend Makeup to allow for greater flexibility in matching and creating varying skin tones. Each Mini-Pro Theatrical Makeup Supplies Kit includes: step-by-step instructions, 5 color palette (Alabaster 1B, Natural Beige Blush 25A, Light Cinnamon 28A, Ruddy Bronze 30A, Contour 1 37) (7 gm/color), Colorset Powder (0.25 oz), Black Pencil Liner, Cosmetic Brush, 2 Non-Latex Triangular Foam Wedges and Powder Puff.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each Mehron CreamBlend Medium Theatrical Make Up Kit includes enough makeup for 10-15 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Admed Adhesive (0.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's AdMed Liquid Adhesive is a clear, synthetic adhesive that stands up to the toughest performance conditions. AdMed Liquid Adhesive is used by Professional Clowns to secure their Clown Nose and by Makeup Artists and Special Effects Artists for prosthesis and Bald Caps. AdMed Liquid Adhesive is perspiration resistant and adheres through the most active performances.

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Super Stick Adhesive Strips
DescriptionData.Description: Double-sided adhesive strips for an extremely strong yet gentle hold for noses. Comes in 3 inch x 1/2 inch strips, 25 per pack.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Spirit Gum Adhesive Remover (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Spirit Gum Remover is made to be gentler on your skin than other gum removers. Spirit Gum Remover by Mehron is a specially developed solvent to gently remove makeup adhesives such as Spirit Gum Liquid Adhesive from the skin. Mehron Spirit Gum Remover is used throughout the Performance Industry because Performers recognize the safe effective formula of Mehron Spirit Gum Remover will not damage the skin.
Please note that this item is flammable and cannot be shipped via Air or International shipping.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Mehron Spirit Gum Remover will give 1 to 5 applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Ruby Red Stickable Gems
DescriptionData.Description: Ruby Red Self Adhesive Peel & Stick Gems come in sheets of 100 acrylic gems in an assortment of 6 colors and 3 shapes. The smallest self adhesive jewel is 3/16 in in diameter and the tear drop shape is 1/4 in x 3/8 in in size. Just peel and stick the gem right onto the skin. Use them like a bindi on the face or as self adhesive body jewels as a ring, bracelet or necklace. Each sheet of self adhesive jewels has 100 jewels.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Just slide off the plastic and stick to add depth to your face painting creations!

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Blood Red FX Tooth Paint (0.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Tooth FX is a non-toxic, temporary color for teeth that lets you add just the right effect for your character by coloring selected teeth. Mehron Tooth FX dries quickly and last for hours. Each Tooth FX Tooth Paint comes in a 0.25 ounce container and includes instructions.

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Viper Split Fangs
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Viper Fangs are easy to customize without any need for messy adhesives, glues or putty. Once customized they are easy to apply and remove.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use custom fangs for most realistic effects for halloween or entertainment
Customized Fangs can be reused multiple times
Easy to pop in and pop out
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Gold FX Tooth Paint (0.25 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Tooth FX is a non-toxic, temporary color for teeth that lets you add just the right effect for your character by coloring selected teeth. Mehron Tooth FX dries quickly and last for hours. Each Tooth FX Tooth Paint comes in a 0.25 ounce container and includes instructions.

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Bucky Teeth Cap
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Bucky Teeth are easy to customize without any need for messy adhesives, glues or putty. Once customized they are easy to apply and remove.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use bucky teeth cap for most realistic effects for costumes such as clown, hillybilly, cute angel etc.
Customized caps can be reused multiple times
Easy to pop in and pop out
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Scarecrow Fangs Customizing Kit Refill
DescriptionData.Description: Scarecrow Customizing Kit Refill is a great accessory to use in case you need to correct the mold already created.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Easy to use to customize Scarecrow fangs
Non-toxic and safe to use on teeth

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Rubber Ears
DescriptionData.Description: These huge, soft vinyl ears fit over your own ears for a super comical look! Ears are about 4 1/2 inches tall and fit best if your own ears have detached earlobes. Also great fun to put over the end of your prop stethoscope for hospital use. Sold in pairs.

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Space Ear Tips - Large
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Small Space Ear Tips are very easy to apply to create hobbit ears, elf ears or alien ears. Woochie Elf Ears are latex prosthetic ears and measure about 2 inches length. Easy to apply and perfect for creating a realistic elf look for Halloween. For children 8 years and older. Spirit Gum and Spirit Gum Remover not included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie 3-D Burn
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Cut Set EZ FX Kit
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Gouge Set EZ FX Kit
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Large Pig Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Large Pig Nose turns any human child into a barnyard animal. The Woochie Large Pig Nose is a latex prosthetic nose. The Pig Nose comes in two pieces, the nose piece and the chin piece. The pig nose piece is 2" long. This Pig nose is easily applied using spirit gum (sold separately) and with proper care, can be used again and again. Please use with children 8 years and older.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Phantom '98
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Stage Blood (8 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Graftobian Stage Blood is the color of real blood with a realistic slow dripping syrup consistency. Unlike gel bloods, this Stage Blood from Graftobian will dry to look like real dried blood instead of remaining wet. If you're looking for realism, the color and consistency of Graftobian Stage Blood is perfect as zombie stage blood. Comes in 8 ounce size.
Each 8 ounce Graftobian Stage Blood bottle will give 80-150 applications.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 8 ounce Graftobian Stage Blood bottle will give 80-150 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Stage Blood (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Stage Blood is the color of real blood with a realistic slow dripping syrup consistency. Unlike gel bloods, this Stage Blood from Graftobian will dry to look like real dried blood instead of remaining wet. If you're looking for realism, the color and consistency of Graftobian Stage Blood is perfect as zombie stage blood. Comes in 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2 ounce Graftobian Stage Blood bottle will give 20-50 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Blood Gel (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Blood Gel has a syrup based fake blood, making it the consistency of thick honey. Because this fake blood product is a deep red color, drips slowly and has a wet look that never dries, it's ideal for making fake blood costumes for Halloween. Graftobian Blood Gel bottle comes with brush caps for easy application.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Graftobian Blood Gel container will give 10 to 30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Gore FX Gelatin Makeup - 3 Pack (2 oz ea)
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Gore FX Gelatin Makeup is the ''heat and serve'' of gore fx makeup. Just heat in warm water and apply to create realistic burned or mangled effects with ease using one, two or all three of the available colors. As an alternative to liquid latex, Graftobian FX Gelatin is non-latex and dries more quickly.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 3 pack of 2 ounce Graftobian FX Gelatins container will give 10 to 30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Pro Pencil Dual Sharpener
DescriptionData.Description: Ultra soft makeup pencils created specifically for outlining and drawing face and body designs. They glide on easily and are enclosed in a sturdy casing that "peels off" when sharpened. Best used with Pro Pencil Sharpener.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Great for slim and regular pro-pencils

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Woochie Clown Noses (Small)
DescriptionData.Description: Very lightweight rubber noses in matte light red. Especially great for hobo and character clowns. Can be applied with spirit gum, latex, etc. For best results, place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Apply grease/cream makeup to nose and set with powder to match makeup
Apply with spirit gum, latex, etc.
Place a cotton ball in the tip of larger noses to help maintain shape

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie World's Longest Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie World's Longest Nose is a very long nose which transforms any normal face into a very silly face. The Woochie World's Longest Nose is a latex prosthetic nose that measures a whopping 6" long. The Longest Nose is very easy to apply using spirit gum (sold separately) and can be used again and again with proper care. For children 8 years and older.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Slashed Eye
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Giant House Fly (7")
DescriptionData.Description: For a great gag ask the audience if they've seen a HUGE fly. When you turn around, this 7 inch long giant fly has landed on your back! For added laughs, hold on to the Giant Fly Swatter and use a Mosquito Whistle for a fly buzzing sound and wear a pair of Nerd Glasses! Jumbo Swatter, Mosquito Whistle and Nerd Glasses sold separately (see below).

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Blue Man Makeup Kits
DescriptionData.Description: Cinema Secrets Blue Man Group kit contains the basics that you need to become a blue man, woman or child. The Cinema Secrets Blue Man Group kits includes a blue cap, blue makeup and spirit gum to hold the cap in place. Please note that you still need to apply makeup to the blue bald cap, the blue cap just makes the makeup application easier.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Prescription Notepads in Green
DescriptionData.Description: Clown Antic's very own Rx Notepads let you prescribe Smiles, Hugs and Kisses from the Giggle Clinic (with refills). Sold individually, approx. 50 sheets per pad.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron 3D Gel - Blood Red (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Blood Red 3D Gel is ideal for making realistic 3D special effects for ghoulish and high impact Halloween and stage characters. To use the 3D Blood Red Gel, just heat it to a liquid form, brush on, allow curing, and add any extra makeup to complete the effect. 3D Gel requires no adhesive and can be used in place of liquid latex. Mehron 3D Blood Red Gel comes in a 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2 ounce Mehron 3D Gel container will give 5-20 applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Biker Chick Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Like your chicken "tuff?" Gag features a 6 inch rubber chicken all set to ride, as your "biker chick."

DescriptionData.Title: Rubber Chicken (5 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: The all time classic Rubber Chicken (5 Inch), now in convenient pocket size! Make the mini Rubber Chicken a part of your repertoire today!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 5" rubber chicken work great as gag gifts and are ideal for practical jokes

DescriptionData.Title: Stretchy Rubber Chickens (7 Inch)
DescriptionData.Description: Stretchy rubber chicken that starts at 7 inches unstretched.

DescriptionData.Title: Pop Up Tie Gimmick
DescriptionData.Description: This is a fantastic comedy gimmick that can be used over and over again during your show as a running gag. At any time during your show, you can make your tie suddenly pop straight up into the air without any visible manipulation by you! Your hands can be holding something in full view yet your tie will pop up! The gimmick furnished will fit work with any tie (tie not included, must not be of a heavy material) This gimmick is never visible to the audience so we will it keep it a secret and not show its picture here.

DescriptionData.Title: Slingshot Pig Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Pigs really can fly! This silly Slingshot Flying Pig can be shot long distances using his elastic arms. Put one finger in each of the hands' pockets, pull back and let go. The soft, furry Pig is funny with its big head and bulging eyes. As an added bonus, every time you shoot him, he lets out three loud oinking sounds. Measures: approximately 9 inches long. Warning: Pig May Fly at High Speeds. Aim away from people, pets or breakable objects. So be careful with your Flying Pig.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Warning: Pig may reach high velocity, do not shoot at people or breakable objects

DescriptionData.Title: Pick-A-Card Gag Card - Jumbo
DescriptionData.Description: Carry this fun walk around gag with you and invite spectators to "Pick a card, any card..." they will be amazed that you actually happen to have that very card in your hand! This jumbo playing card is the perfect size to use with a larger audience, about 7 inches tall.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Standard sized playing card with all 52 cards printed on it

DescriptionData.Title: Pick-A-Card Gag Card
DescriptionData.Description: Carry this fun walk around gag with you and invite spectators to "Pick a card, any card..." they will be amazed that you actually happen to have that very card in your hand! Standard card size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Standard sized playing card with all 52 cards printed on it

DescriptionData.Title: Pet Bug In A Box Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Cute pet bugs inside tiny boxes. The bugs have wiggly legs that move when you open the box, making it come to life! A great start for your own "Bug Collection!"
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pet bug in a tiny box

DescriptionData.Title: Really Big Pencils (14") - Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: The greatest feature of this Giant Pencil is that it's a real pencil. The lead writes, the eraser erases and it's perfect for making your desk look tiny or for doing huge crossword puzzles. Great for restaurant or business performances, or whenever you need to make a little note of something! Note that lead is an insert, and cannot be sharpened. 14 inches tall.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Blue Guy Character Makeup Kits
DescriptionData.Description: From Mehron, the official makeup supplier for the Blue Man Group, the Mehron Blue Man Group kit contains everything you need to become an all blue man, woman or child. The Mehron Blue Man Makeup Kit contains all the professional blue man makeup that is used by the real Blue Man Group.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes: Latex Bald Cap, 0.125 oz Spirit Gum adhesive, 1 oz Spirit Gum Remover, Liquid Latex, 1.25 oz Latex Mask Grease in Blue, 0.25 oz Colorset Powder, Powder Puff, Latex Wedge Sponge, Cotton Tip Applicators, Makeup Remover Pads and Instructions

DescriptionData.Title: Smooth-On ULTIMATE ZOMBIE KIT Complete Silicone appliance kit!
DescriptionData.Description: The Ultimate Zombie Kit is packed with everything you need for easy zombie designs either directly on skin or on plastic plate molds. Has all the supplies needed to realistically simulate open wounds, infections, scars, burns, cuts etc. Perfect for Halloween, Zombie Walks, film make-up and theatrical performances! The Ultimate Zombie Kit includes Thi-Vex Thickening Agent, Skin Tite Silicone, Rubber Glass, Silc Pig Pigment, Mixing Sticks & Cups, Fake Teeth, Step-By-Step How-To Guide and Makeup Palette. Watch this online tutorial and get started today!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Packed with everything you need for easy zombie designs
Perfect for Halloween, Zombie Walks, film make-up and theatrical performances!
The Ultimate Zombie Kit includes Thi-Vex Thickening Agent, Skin Tite Silicone, Rubber Glass, Silc Pig Pigment, Mixing Sticks & Cups, Fake Teeth, Step-By-Step How-To Guide and Makeup Palette

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Oozing Wounds 3 Pc
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Shredded
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie Skull EZ FX Kits
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Skull EZ Kit is an face paint set that turns any head into a long-dead skull head. The Woochie Skull Kit comes with face paint instructions, .08 ounce of skull white, yellow and black face paint colors, 2 sponge wedges, .5 ounce of powder, one powder puff. You can easily face paint on that dead for a long time look.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint:
Cinema Secret products are produced in the United States and are FDA approved There are no hazardous byproducts in Cinema Secret products The materials that Cinema Secret uses in their products are of high cosmetic grade and compliant with global cosmetic guidelines
As with any cosmetic product, it is a good idea to try on a small patch of skin first to see if there are any adverse reactions Avoid the eye area and sensitive skin or skin that you might have under a doctors care

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Clown Makeup Kits - Auguste/Hobo
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian complete clown creme makeup kit includes everything you need to become a clown! Perfect for teaching or when you're on the go. These kits are packed with value! Auguste/Hobo Kit includes: full and helpful instructions, 1/2 oz. Clown White, 1/8 oz. each of Black, Red, Auguste and Pink Creme Based Make-Up, 1/4 oz. Translucent Setting Powder, powder puff, Black pencil, makeup brush, 3 foam wedges and a 1.5 inch Red Goshman Foam Clown Nose as a finishing touch.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes: full and helpful instructions, 1/2 oz Clown White, 1/8 oz each of Black, Red, Auguste and Pink Creme Based Make-Up, 1/4 oz Translucent Setting Powder, powder puff, Black pencil, makeup brush, 3 foam wedges, and a 1.5 inch Red Goshman Foam Clown Nose

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Sweat & Tears Special Effects Liquid (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Sweat & Tears Special Effects Liquid lets you weep or perspire at a moments notice! Sweat & Tears Liquid is a clear liquid use to create beads of moisture or tears on the skin. This 1 ounce bottle of Sweat & Tears is produced for theatrical applications, not to be used to fool your lover, wife, husband or parents! Mehron can not be held responsible if someone in your life fools you with this realistic Sweat & Tears formula. 1 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Mehron Sweat & Tears bottle will give dozens to hundreds of applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Squirt Blood (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Performance Squirt Blood is a quality Squirt Blood that is water based, not sticky syrup, so it squirts, gushes and splatters. Performance Squirt Blood can be for splatter effects on skin and clothes or used in appliances with tubing and a pump bulb to project squirting blood effects. Because Mehron Performance Squirt Blood is water based it is easily removed from skin, hair and costumes. 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2 ounce Mehron Squirt Blood bottle will give 10 to 30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Stage Blood (4.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Stage Blood is a realistic, viscous, nearly opaque special effects blood that is completely non-toxic and washes off skin easily with soap and water. and so safe it's even edible, so it can safely be used around the mouth area. Mehron Special Effects Blood is a syrup based blood that will not dry, making it ideal for blood capsules and mouth application. 4.5 ounces.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 4.5 ounce Mehron Stage Blood bottle will give 50 to 100 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Blood Gel (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Blood Gel is the blood of choice for theater productions, video shoots and Halloween fake blood. Mehron Coagulated Blood Gel is a thick syrup based blood that will not dry or drip but will stay moist. This realistic looking Coagulated Blood Gel is used throughout the entertainment industry by Special Effects Artists to simulate coagulated cuts and gashes. This carded 1 ounce container of Coagulated Blood Gel comes with a free spatula for easy application.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Mehron Coagulated Blood bottle will give 10 to 30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Stage Blood (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Stage Blood is a realistic, viscous, nearly opaque liquid blood that is completely non-toxic and washes off skin easily with soap and water. and so safe it's even edible, so it can safely be used around the mouth area. Mehron Professional Stage Blood is a syrup based blood that will not dry, making it ideal for blood capsules and mouth application. The 1 ounce bottle of Mehron Stage Blood includes an applicator brush.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Mehron Stage Blood container will give 10 to 30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics Clown Nose Prescription
DescriptionData.Description:
Clown Nose Prescription is a quick and easy way to feel better on a down day! Includes 2 foam clown noses, one for yourself and one to help a friend, companion, family member or anyone who think might be able to get out of their blues with some extra fun.
Please note that this product includes small parts and is NOT recommended for children under 3 years.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes 2 noses and get well gift card
Great to get over a moody day
Great gifts for friends and family
Not recommended for children under 3 years

DescriptionData.Title: Fun Express Light-up Flashing Clown Noses w/ String
DescriptionData.Description: Light up clown or reindeer nose secured with a black cord. To use, just remove from packaging, strap it on, and give it a tap to start the red light blinking. Self-contained, batteries included.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: To use, just remove from packaging, strap it on, and give it a tap to start the red light blinking

DescriptionData.Title: HMS Naso Squeeze Clown Noses
DescriptionData.Description: Medium-sized, soft molded red vinyl clown nose that needs no strings or glue! Just squeeze it open and it gently grips your nose. Great for giveaways or quick changes!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Medium-sized, soft molded red vinyl clown nose that needs no strings or glue!
Just squeeze it open and it gently grips your nose

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Clown Nose Tips - T5 Glitter Heart (Red)
DescriptionData.Description: ProKNOWS Clown Nose with a foam interior and glitter exterior. Heart shaped tip.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made with a foam interior and vinyl coating

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Antics Jest String Clown Noses (1/pk)
DescriptionData.Description: These simple string noses are made of bright red, high gloss plastic 1 1/2" half spheres with elastic string. Fits on all adults, kids 2 years and up, and noses of all shapes. No adhesive required, doesn't fall off!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Fits on all adults, kids 2 years and up, and noses of all shapes

DescriptionData.Title: The Balloon Tool - Instant Balloon Tying Tool
DescriptionData.Description: The Balloon Tool easily ties air or helium filled balloons, regardless of age, physical challenges or long fingernails. The Balloon Tool can also attach a string or ribbon as you tie the knot, plus curl the ribbon without putting The Balloon Tool down. Into decorating? Easily build balloon bouquets or arches. It will even knot two balloons together, as simply as one! Can be used with equal ease by righties and lefties! See how easy it is! Watch a video of how to use the Balloon Tool with (Quick Time) or (Windows Media Player).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Can also attach strings and curl ribbons
Good for left or right handed users

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Castor Seal (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Castor Seal is a fine grade of Castor Oil product used to protect latex appliances and prep them for makeup application so the creme makeup is less likely to look chalky. Note: if using Rubber Mask Grease makeup (which contains castor oil in its foundation), this step is not needed . Graftobian Castor Seal also makes an excellent lip gloss.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Graftobian Castor Seal bottle will give 10 to 30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: My Clown Story Gag
DescriptionData.Description: This is a pocket-sized photo album has all the pictures of your near and dear. Includes 7 images - My Parents, My Kids, My Pride & Joy, My Six Little Ones, Coffee & Rolls, 1/4 Pounder with Cheese and My Dead Ant (aunt). Comes in a leatherette photo booklet.

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Cartoon Hands
DescriptionData.Description: This pair of white, cartoon-style hands fit over your hand like a glove and make waving fun! Made of foam-covered cloth.

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Butterfly Nets
DescriptionData.Description: Use this little net to catch your runaway Chattering Teeth or add to your bug collection. 6 inch net w/ 13 inch handle, assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: "Frog" Toy Bubble Makers
DescriptionData.Description: Streams of shiny bubbles and motion toys capture the attention of onlookers of all ages! Watch in awe as these colorful creatures blow streams of bubbles and spin their glittery fins or leap for joy with just a puff of air. Bubblin Toys are packaged individually with a dipping tray and a 2 oz. bottle of Little Kids No Stain, No Dye, Non-Toxic bubble solution or as a 2-Pack with 2 different bugs, 2 dipping trays and a 4 oz. bottle of Little Kids No Stain, No Dye, Non Toxic bubble solution. Assorted colors.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Bubbles to make any age happy
Includes dipping tray, 2 oz safe bubble solution

DescriptionData.Title: Bow Tie, Jumbo - Squirting
DescriptionData.Description:
This squirting bow tie completes your prankster costume perfectly. Has an attractive multicolored polka dot design that smartly masks the mischief behind!
Includes: Bowtie with an elastic neck band measuring approximately 14" x 8-1/2" and a 20" long tube connected to a 2" squeeze bulb that squirts.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Attractive colorful polka dot design that masks the mischief smartly

DescriptionData.Title: Big Momma's Undies Gag
DescriptionData.Description: Oversized red bloomers with black lace trim are sure to get a hilarious reaction! Use them as a production item, as a skit prop, as a flag in a parade - use your imagination!

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Bandage Stickers (15") [Toy]
DescriptionData.Description: This huge (15" x 4.5") bandage sticker is perfect for really big boo-boos. Try using it on another clown prop - it really sticks! A great gag gift for car owners - their very own fender mender! Sold individually.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Celebre Pro Mineral Powder - Sienna (0.41 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Celebre Pro Mineral Powder is an ultra fine face powder that works great with cream makeup especially with Mehron Pro-HD Cream and Powder Foundations.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Does not alter makeup's true color
Enhances natural look by minimizing shine

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Celebre Pro Mineral Powder - Saffron (0.41 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Celebre Pro Mineral Powder is an ultra fine face powder that works great with cream makeup especially with Mehron Pro-HD Cream and Powder Foundations.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Does not alter makeup's true color
Enhances natural look by minimizing shine

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Texas Dirt Special Effects Makeup Powder (0.75 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Specialty Powder in Texas Dirt is formulated to create a realistic effect of being covered with sooty ash. Texas Dirt Powder has an ultrafine, loose consistency that can easily be applied for just the right touch to enhance a character's makeup. Mehron Texas Dirt Powder has the same look and feel of actual dirt. 0.75 ounce bottle has shaker top to let you use small amounts. 0.75 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.75 ounce bottle of Mehron Special Makeup Effects Powder will give dozens of applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Special Makeup Effects Powder - Charred Ash (0.75 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Charred Ash Special Makeup Effects Powder is formulated to create a realistic effect of being covered with sooty ash. Charred Ash Powder has an ultrafine, loose consistency that can easily be applied for just the right touch to enhance a character's makeup. Mehron Charred Ash Powder has the look and feel of ash. 0.75 ounce bottle has shaker top to let you use small amounts. 0.75 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 0.75 ounce bottle of Mehron Special Makeup Effects Powder will give dozens of applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Fish Skeleton Comb - Red
DescriptionData.Description: This fun comb makes a great silly prop. Tell the audience about your poor pet fish, show the comb and comment that he "doesn't eat much but he still comes in handy" and proceed to comb your hair to giggles. Approximately 8 3/4 inches long.

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Comb (15") - Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: 15 inch Giant Plastic Comb in bright colors. Try using with our Giant Plastic Scissors in a barbershop scene or along a parade route!

DescriptionData.Title: Fish & Chips Gag
DescriptionData.Description: A colorful fish and "chips" make a yummy clown snack!

DescriptionData.Title: Fart Whistle/Rubber Razzer Noisemaker
DescriptionData.Description: Blow through this whistle, and get a noise like a raspberry! Click here and you can listen to the whistle sound!

DescriptionData.Title: Extendable Meal Set Gag
DescriptionData.Description: An ordinary-looking Knife, Fork and Spoon, that extend from 8 inches to 25 inches. A great gag for picnics and parties!

DescriptionData.Title: Ear On A Stick Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Life-sized Ear on a Stick adds to your Smile on a Stick schtick! Use it to say, "I'm All Ears! I Ear You! Ear Me Out! Not Listening!" or the ever popular "Do You Ear Me Now?" Beautifully printed, heavy card on a wooden stick.

DescriptionData.Title: Plastic Egg Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Realistic foam eggs can be easily flattened and concealed. Plastic eggs are hollow so they're lighter, with no holes. Sold individually.

DescriptionData.Title: Nurse Ducky Prop (1/pack)
DescriptionData.Description: 2 inch vinyl nurse rubber duckies in assorted styles, sold individually.

DescriptionData.Title: Single Yellow Jumbo Plastic Crayon (20") - 1/pack
DescriptionData.Description: Giant Crayon Bank in yellow makes a very visible walkaround prop. Use this jumbo plastic crayon to direct a clown choir, to "color" on an oversized pad of paper, etc. This item is also a coin bank, so you can fill it with productions items if you wish. Use your imagination! Approximately 20 inches long and 3.5 inches in diameter. One per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One yellow giant plastic crayon bank

DescriptionData.Title: Single Red Jumbo Plastic Crayon (20") - 1/pack
DescriptionData.Description: Giant Crayon Bank in red makes a very visible walkaround prop. Use this jumbo plastic crayon to direct a clown choir, to "color" on an oversized pad of paper, etc. This item is also a coin bank, so you can fill it with productions items if you wish. Use your imagination! Approximately 20 inches long and 3.5 inches in diameter. One per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One red giant plastic crayon bank

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Bald Cap Makeup Kits
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Bald Cap Kit has to have a stage quality bald cap. The Mehron bald cap includes the regular sized Professional Latex Bald Cap, as well as all the make-up products you will need to attach, color and remove your bald cap. The Graftobian bald cap kits comes with 5 different colors so you can create variety of characters, all of them bald of course. With easy to follow step by step pictorial instructions, losing your hair has never been easier.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Mehron cosmetic products are manufactured in the USA using only FDA listed materials The raw materials that Mehron uses are also globally compliant with cosmetic guidelines, and their products are not tested on animals Mehron makes no claims as to the potential for allergic reactions; if in doubt, perform a small patch test by applying makeup to a one inch square patch inside the elbow After 20 minutes, remove the paint with water only and wipe dry, then look for any reaction on the skin

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Premium Zombie Character Kit
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Premium Zombie Character Kit contains makeup, supplies and essentials together in one kit, making it easy even for beginners.
Includes: ProColor Ring Bruise Palette, Color Cup, 3D Gel, Colorset Powder, Tooth FX, Non-Latex Triangular Foam Wedge, Cotton Tip Applicators, Makeup Remover Cloth, Powder Puff and step-by-step instructions.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 5-Colors (Spanish Green, Burnt Maroon, Bloody Rose, Spanish Olive, Midnight Sky)

Includes ProColor Ring Bruise Palette, Color Cup, 3D Gel, Colorset Powder, Tooth FX, Non-Latex Triangular Foam Wedge, Cotton Tip Applicators, Makeup Remover Cloth, Powder Puff and step-by-step instructions.

Mehron cosmetic products are manufactured in the USA using only FDA listed material. The raw materials that Mehron uses are globally compliant with cosmetic guidelines, and products are not tested on animals.

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Mini-Pro Theatrical Makeup Kits - Fair Complexion KMP-F
DescriptionData.Description:
Mehron Mini-Pro Student Theatrical Makeup Kits feature Mehron CreamBlend Makeup, used by professionals makeup artists worldwide.
CreamBlend Stick is a highly pigmented, refined cream makeup base containing vitamins and antioxidants. CreamBlend Stick does to contain the petroleum base often found in traditional "greasepaint" makeup.
The Mehron Mini-Pro Kit Theatrical Kit includes two base colors of Mehron CreamBlend Makeup to allow for greater flexibility in matching and creating varying skin tones. Each Mini-Pro Kit Theatrical Kit includes: step-by-step instructions, 5 color palette (Alabaster 1B, Soft Peach 22A, Natural Beige Blush 25A, Light Cinnamon 28A, Contour 1 37) (7 gm/color), Colorset Powder (0.25 oz), Black Pencil Liner, Cosmetic Brush, 2 Non-Latex Triangular Foam Wedges and a Powder Puff.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each Mehron CreamBlend Fair Theatrical Make Up Kit includes enough makeup for 10-15 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron All Pro Theatrical Makeup Kits - Medium to Fair Complexion
DescriptionData.Description: Includes step-by-step instructions, five full size StarBlend Cake bases (Alabaster, Natural Beige Blush, Light Cinnamon, Ruddy Bronze, Contour) (7 gm/color), Black and Brown Pencil Liners, Colorset Powder (0.25 oz), 3 E.Y.E Creams (0.3 oz), L.I.P Cream (0.3 oz), Hair White, Stage Blood (0.5 oz), Modeling Putty/Wax (0.5 oz), Crepe Hair, Spirit Gum (0.25 oz), Liquid Latex (1 oz), 2 Cosmetic Brushes, 2 Foam Sponges, 2 Stipple Sponges, Powder Puff, Powder Brush and Makeup Remover (1 oz).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each Mehron StarBlend Medium Theatrical Makeup Kit includes enough makeup for 50 - 70 applications
StarBlend Cake Makeup is highly pigmented pressed powder

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron All Pro Theatrical Kits - Dark Complexion (StarBlend) K110-B
DescriptionData.Description: All Pro Theatrical Makeup Kit includes: step-by-step instructions, five full size StarBlend Cake bases (Light Khaki, Rich Topaz, Light Cocoa, Sable, Ebony) (7 gm/color), Black and Brown Pencil Liners, Colorset Powder (0.25 oz), 3 E.Y.E Creams (0.3 oz), L.I.P Cream (0.3 oz), Hair White, Stage Blood (0.5 oz), Modeling Putty/Wax (0.5 oz), Crepe Hair, Spirit Gum (0.25 oz), Liquid Latex (1 oz), 2 Cosmetic Brushes, 2 Foam Sponges, 2 Stipple Sponges, Powder Puff, Powder Brush and Makeup Remover (1 oz).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each Mehron StarBlend Dark Theatrical Makeup Kit includes enough makeup for 50 - 70 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Celebre Pro Theatrical Makeup Kits - TV/Video CPK-TV
DescriptionData.Description: Each Celebre Pro Theatrical Makeup Kit includes: step-by-step instructions, seven full size Celebre Makeup bases (Alabaster 1B, Soft Beige TV4, Light Tan TV6, Medium Tan TV8, Bronzed Tan TV10, Mid-Light OS4, Mid-Dark Olive OS8), Black and Brown Pencil Liners, Colorset Powder (0.25 oz), 2 CHEEK Powders, E.Y.E Powders, L.I.P Cream, Hair White, Stage Blood, Spirit Gum (0.25 oz), Spirit Gum Remover (0.25 oz),2 Cosmetic Brushes, 2 Non-Latex Triangular Foam Wedge, Powder Puff and much more.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each Mehron Celebre Pro Theatrical Makeup Kit includes enough makeup for 20-30 applications

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Penny (3")
DescriptionData.Description: Giant foam molars work great with our Giant Toothbrushes (see below). Don't forget to brush!

DescriptionData.Title: Jack In The Box
DescriptionData.Description: A cute little box is opened to reveal your favorite toy - a Jack in the Box! Less than 2 inches tall. Assorted colors and box shapes.

DescriptionData.Title: "I've Been Framed" Gag Card
DescriptionData.Description: Another pun-derful card with lots of applications... tell your audience a story of some missing cookies (or cards, or silks, or just about anything). While speaking, pretend to notice something in your pocket and pull it out - it's the missing item! Have the card attached to the back of the item, or in your other pocket, and reveal the card right after the "missing" item - insisting to your audience, "I've Been Framed!"
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Card with "I" inside an ornate frame printed on it

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron 3D Gel - Fleshtone (Lt Tan) (2 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Fleshtone 3D Gel is ideal for making realistic 3D special effects for ghoulish and high impact Halloween and stage characters. To use the 3D Gelatin Effects just heat it to a liquid form, brush on, allow curing, and add stage blood or makeup to complete the effect. 3D Gel requires no adhesive and can be used in place of liquid latex. Mehron Fleshtone 3D Gel comes in a 2 ounce size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 2 ounce Mehron 3D Gel container will give 5-20 applications, depending on use

DescriptionData.Title: Runny Nose Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Is your nose running? You'd better catch it. This 2.5 inch tall soft rubber nose with plastic feet runs across the tabletop when you wind it up. This is such a clever toy, it's sure to become the "scenter" of attention. Tissues not included. Hilarious when you try to catch it with the Mini Net (see below).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Rubber nose with plastic running feet

DescriptionData.Title: Fish Skeleton Comb - Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: This fun comb makes a great silly prop. Tell the audience about your poor pet fish, show the comb and comment that he "doesn't eat much but he still comes in handy" and proceed to comb your hair to giggles. Approximately 8 3/4 inches long.

DescriptionData.Title: Single Green Jumbo Plastic Crayon (20") - 1/pack
DescriptionData.Description: Giant Crayon Bank in green makes a very visible walkaround prop. Use this jumbo plastic crayon to direct a clown choir, to "color" on an oversized pad of paper, etc. This item is also a coin bank, so you can fill it with productions items if you wish. Use your imagination! Approximately 20 inches long and 3.5 inches in diameter. One per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One green giant plastic crayon bank

DescriptionData.Title: Single Blue Jumbo Plastic Crayon (20") - 1/pack
DescriptionData.Description: Giant Crayon Bank in blue makes a very visible walkaround prop. Use this jumbo plastic crayon to direct a clown choir, to "color" on an oversized pad of paper, etc. This item is also a coin bank, so you can fill it with productions items if you wish. Use your imagination! Approximately 20 inches long and 3.5 inches in diameter. One per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: One blue giant plastic crayon bank

DescriptionData.Title: Modeling Putty
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron Modeling Putty/Wax is widely popular in stage makeup and entertainment industry for adding 3D effects to character makeup. Ideal for building up facial features or creating fake wounds. It is flexible and easy to use for creating fine details.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Flexible and easy to use for 3D makeup
Preferred brand by stage artists, entertainment professionals, drama teachers and students
Easily moldable to create fine details

DescriptionData.Title: Huge Flexible Pencils (13 inch)
DescriptionData.Description: Flexible pencils can be bent and curved - it can even be tied in a knot, and it really writes, too!

DescriptionData.Title: Frog In Throat Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Cute rubber frogs are approximately 2 inches tall. Easily conceal in your palm and pretend to cough. Then just produce the "frog in your throat" for a laugh.

DescriptionData.Title: Small World Mini Globe Prop
DescriptionData.Description: 1 1/2 inch, metal globe on a split key ring. Ask your audience member where he or she is from and say something like, "Really? I have an aunt from around there!" hold up the key chain globe, dangling it, and say "Small World!"

DescriptionData.Title: Nerd Glasses
DescriptionData.Description: Thick-framed glasses make your eyes look "googly-eyed." Will help even the very nearsighted clown to "see."

DescriptionData.Title: Happy Birthday Glasses
DescriptionData.Description: Here's a birthday cake you won't mind getting on your face. With frosting, candles, and playful writing on the cake you might actually try to blow out these flames. With high quality plastic frames and metal hinges these glasses will last for many birthdays to come. Fun to use with any of our Birthday Hats (see below) or on their own! Plastic hinges, UV 400 protection, fits adults and kids 12 and up. By Elope.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Fits adults and kids 12 and up

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Gem Rings
DescriptionData.Description: Adjustable, colorful jumbo rings. Plastic "stone" with adjustable gold-tone metal band. Assorted colors, sold individually.

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Gem Flower Rings
DescriptionData.Description: Pretty multi-colored flower rings. Approximately 1 3/4 inch diameter with adjustable metal band.

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Clapping Hands Clackers
DescriptionData.Description: Clackers are hand-held noisemakers that make a clacking sound when they are shaken, as the side flappers slap the center stick. Great for making a ruckus or getting audience attention. Assorted colors. Click here and you can listen the sound!

DescriptionData.Title: It Card Gag Cards
DescriptionData.Description: This is the perfect gag card! The performer searches through the deck and removes a card, claiming that this card is "it" - the spectator's selected card. When the card is shown, the word "IT" is seen printed on it in bold, black letters!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Regular playing card with "IT" printed on it in bold, black letters

DescriptionData.Title: Snapper I'Jit Stick Prop
DescriptionData.Description: This wooden stick has one end that seems to snap into place with the help of a hidden rubber band, but your volunteer can't make it work. Once you show your helper the trick, however, they will see that it's a SNAP! Color may vary.

DescriptionData.Title: Fake Hypo Syringe Gag
DescriptionData.Description: Fake syringe is harmless fun. Retracting needle lets you give fake shots or pretend to draw "blood." Approx. 5 inches long.

DescriptionData.Title: My Honey in a Bikini Gag
DescriptionData.Description: This is a pocket-sized photo of your sweetie makes a great finale to "My Clown Story".
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pocket-sized gag clown in a bikini photo

DescriptionData.Title: Magic Light Bulb Tricks
DescriptionData.Description:
Light Bulb lights up whenever the base and side make contact with a piece metal. Wear a ring with a piece of foil in one hand and suddenly have a BRIGHT idea!
To light: have a piece of metal at least an inch long (aluminum foil works well, tucked under a ring if you wear one). The trick is to touch the metal to the bottom AND the side of the metal threaded part of the bulb at the same time.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: To light: touch metal to the side AND bottom of the metal part of bulb at the same time
Have a piece of metal at least an inch long (aluminum foil works well, tucked under a ring if you wear one)

DescriptionData.Title: Little Pail Gag
DescriptionData.Description: Another funny groaner - announce that you (or your helper) must not be feeling too well, because you/they are looking "a little pail."

DescriptionData.Title: Little Grater Gag
DescriptionData.Description: This funny groaner works in any performance - when you've just done something great, bring out this prop while saying, "Well that was great, but THIS is a little grater!" Please NOTE: this is an actual little grater and has sharp edges. It is not a prop.

DescriptionData.Title: Mini Level Gag
DescriptionData.Description: The perfect come-back prop! This mini level will prove to your audience that you're "on the level" or "level-headed." Made of unbreakable plexiglass and comes complete with keychain.

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Knife & Fork Sets (15")
DescriptionData.Description: 15 inch long, plastic Knife and Fork are a must for any clown picnic! Each set includes one knife and one fork.

DescriptionData.Title: Kazoos
DescriptionData.Description: Anybody can play a kazoo, all you have to do is hum! Makes a good giveaway item. Plastic Kazoos come in assorted colors. Click here and you can listen the Kazoo sound!

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Playing Cards (7")
DescriptionData.Description: Looking for BIG playing cards? This complete deck of playing cards measures approximately 7 by 4 inches, or roughly the size of four normal playing cards. Heavy plastic coated paper.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: 4 times the size of regular cards

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Paperclip
DescriptionData.Description:
These giant paper clips look just like regular paper clips only bigger! They really work, so you can use them to clip giant stacks of paper together or as oversized paperclip props in clown skit.
At four inches long, these enormous paper clips can hold over 100 sheets of paper, or you can use them as a bookmark, a keychain or more. Nickel-plated steel paper clips are 4" long x 1" wide and made in the USA.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Giant paper clip is 4 inches long and 1 inch wide
Each can clip up to 100 sheets of paper
Use as a silly prop, a keychain, a bookmark and more

DescriptionData.Title: Really Big Pencils (14") - Blue
DescriptionData.Description: The greatest feature of this Giant Pencil is that it's a real pencil. The lead writes, the eraser erases and it's perfect for making your desk look tiny or for doing huge crossword puzzles. Great for restaurant or business performances, or whenever you need to make a little note of something! Note that lead is an insert, and cannot be sharpened. 14 inches tall.

DescriptionData.Title: Really Big Pencils (14") - Red
DescriptionData.Description: The greatest feature of this Giant Pencil is that it's a real pencil. The lead writes, the eraser erases and it's perfect for making your desk look tiny or for doing huge crossword puzzles. Great for restaurant or business performances, or whenever you need to make a little note of something! Note that lead is an insert, and cannot be sharpened. 14 inches tall.

DescriptionData.Title: Really Big Pencils (14") - Green
DescriptionData.Description: The greatest feature of this Giant Pencil is that it's a real pencil. The lead writes, the eraser erases and it's perfect for making your desk look tiny or for doing huge crossword puzzles. Great for restaurant or business performances, or whenever you need to make a little note of something! Note that lead is an insert, and cannot be sharpened. 14 inches tall.

DescriptionData.Title: Graftobian Special Effects Molding Wax (7 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Graftobian Special Effects Molding Wax is the ideal wax for creating about any 3-dimensional facial effect like warts, a broken nose, a deep cut for stage and theater makeup. Use Spirit Gum beneath the Special Effects Molding Wax for longer wear, powder the finished creation and seal with Flexible Wax Sealer. Graftobian's Special Effects Molding Wax formula is very pliable yet sticky enough to hold well even under stress.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 7 ounce Graftobian Special Effects Molding Wax container will give 2 to 30 applications, depending on if you're making warts or large scars

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Comb (15") - Red
DescriptionData.Description: 15 inch Giant Plastic Comb in bright colors. Try using with our Giant Plastic Scissors in a barbershop scene or along a parade route!

DescriptionData.Title: Black/Yellow Rubber Fish
DescriptionData.Description: Giant foam molars work great with our Giant Toothbrushes (see below). Don't forget to brush!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: May come lightly coated in powder to prevent sticking

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Fish Cone Shooters Prop
DescriptionData.Description: 5" Plastic Clown Fish Cone Shooters. Press button and foam ball flies off. Each with a matching 2 1/2" sponge ball on a 42 inch long string. Assorted colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Rubber Gun/Pistol Prop
DescriptionData.Description: This oversized rubber gun looks very realistic (except for the size)...but is light weight and totally safe to carry around. For extra laughs, pass out our Fake Bullet Hole stickers!

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Prescription Notepads in Blue
DescriptionData.Description: Clown Antic's very own Rx Notepads let you prescribe Smiles, Hugs and Kisses from the Giggle Clinic (with refills). Sold individually, approx. 50 sheets per pad.

DescriptionData.Title: Hospital Tote Bag (1/pack)
DescriptionData.Description: Made of canvaslike heavy Denier Nylon, this durable red and white bag is perfect for toting all your hospital clowning accessories. Includes front pocket, sturdy straps and water resistant lining. Approximately 18 inches x 12 inches in size.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Made of canvas-like heavy denier nylon
Includes front pocket, sturdy straps, and water resistant lining

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Prescription Notepads in Pink
DescriptionData.Description: Clown Antic's very own Rx Notepads let you prescribe Smiles, Hugs and Kisses from the Giggle Clinic (with refills). Sold individually, approx. 50 sheets per pad.

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Prescription Notepads in Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: Clown Antic's very own Rx Notepads let you prescribe Smiles, Hugs and Kisses from the Giggle Clinic (with refills). Sold individually, approx. 50 sheets per pad.

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Scissors Prop (17") - Blue
DescriptionData.Description: Colorful 17 inch Giant Plastic Scissors. Try using them with our Giant Plastic Comb in a barbershop scene or along a parade route!

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Scissors Prop (17") - Yellow
DescriptionData.Description: Colorful 17 inch Giant Plastic Scissors. Try using them with our Giant Plastic Comb in a barbershop scene or along a parade route!

DescriptionData.Title: Giant Scissors Prop (17") - Red
DescriptionData.Description: Colorful 17 inch Giant Plastic Scissors. Try using them with our Giant Plastic Comb in a barbershop scene or along a parade route!

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Ribbon Cutting Scissors (24")
DescriptionData.Description: These giant ribbon cutting scissors can be used for rope or paper cutting acts, or for ribbon cutting ceremonies and grand openings - they really work! Jumbo scissors have plain steel blades with painted red wood handles and are 24" long and approx. 10" across at the widest point. Handles and blades can be painted, and the scissors will cut ribbon or other light materials.

DescriptionData.Title: "It's A Secret" Gag Card
DescriptionData.Description: Wanna see a secret? This pun-derful card has lots of applications... use it as a silly walkaround or giveaway, or write your contact info on the back and give it out. When someone asks how you did a trick, just hand them the card, without saying a word. Have fun!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Card with "It's a secret" printed on it

DescriptionData.Title: Service Bell
DescriptionData.Description: Westminster Service Bell is a great gift for your fun loving family or friends.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Perfect accessory for parties and events
Shiny silver finish with a sturdy black base
Perfect for events, parties or public places like restaurants or coffee shops

DescriptionData.Title: Smile On A Stick (Medium Skin Tone)
DescriptionData.Description: Use this Smile on a Stick to turn any frown upside-down! Beautifully printed, heavy card on a wooden stick.

DescriptionData.Title: Grump on A Stick
DescriptionData.Description: A grumpy mouth on a stick. Fun to glue to the back of a Smile on a Stick (see below) and flip back and forth to mime emotions. Mask fun on a stick with grump on a stick. Beautifully printed, heavy card on a wooden stick.

DescriptionData.Title: Santa On A Stick
DescriptionData.Description: Great fun for the holidays. Simply hold the Santa-On-A Stick up to your face and instantly you'll turn into Jolly Old St. Nick. It may not fool Mrs. Claus or the reindeer, but it's sure to get lots of laughs. Beautifully printed, heavy card on a wooden stick.

DescriptionData.Title: Jointed Snake Giveaway
DescriptionData.Description: Jointed plastic snake has a side to side movement like a real snake. This colorful, cartoony looking snake is a super gift for any youngster at a jungle or wild west themed party. Assorted colors, 15 inches long. Sold individually.

DescriptionData.Title: Snake in a Jelly Bean Can Gag
DescriptionData.Description: Looks like an ordinary can of jelly beans until your unsuspecting helper opens the lid and two giant snakes pop out. Made of durable materials. Includes 6 X 3 inch can and two brightly colored 40 inch long cloth-covered snakes.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Jelly bean can with snakes that pop out when opened
6" X 3" can with two 40" cloth covered snakes

DescriptionData.Title: "Split Pepsi Bottle" Gag
DescriptionData.Description: Just ask someone if they'd like to split a Pepsi with you. "Pepsi has this new bottle that prevents germs when sharing." You then literally separate the apparently full bottle into two halves, and hand half to an audience member. Or, comment on how easy this new bottle makes staying on your diet - you can easily drink half a bottle at a time.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Pepsi bottle that splits in half

DescriptionData.Title: Squeakers - Large
DescriptionData.Description: Round, flat squeakers hide easily in your glove or a pocket. Large Squeakers are approximately 2" x 1.75".

DescriptionData.Title: Squeakers - Small
DescriptionData.Description: Round, flat squeakers hide easily in your glove or a pocket. Small Squeakers are approximately 1.25" round.

DescriptionData.Title: Squeakers - Medium
DescriptionData.Description: Round, flat squeakers hide easily in your glove or a pocket. Medium Squeakers are approximately 1.5" round.

DescriptionData.Title: Mosquito Whistles
DescriptionData.Description: This tiny whistle fits in your mouth to make a high pitched buzzing sound. Place between the lips or entirely in your mouth. Try it with our Giant House Fly and Swatter (see below, sold separately). Click here and you can listen to the Whistle sound!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Whistle that makes a buzzing sound like a mosquito

DescriptionData.Title: Sqeeker - Shoe Squeaker
DescriptionData.Description: Attach the Sqeeker to the bottom of your shoe to make a noisy entrance, exit or really silly tap dance routine! Only works on a dress shoes as it requires a hollow arch. Sold individually.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Squeaker that attaches to your shoe
Only works on dress shoes with a hollow arch

DescriptionData.Title: Clown Stethoscope Prop
DescriptionData.Description: Silly Clown Stethoscope has a colorful 4 inch rubber plunger on the end!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Has 4" rubber plunger on the end

DescriptionData.Title: Squirting Rose Gag
DescriptionData.Description: Lovely fake red rose is equipped with a bulb squirter.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Fake rose equipped with bulb water squirter

DescriptionData.Title: Stool Sample Gag
DescriptionData.Description:
This unusual souvenir from the doctor is sure to get a laugh.
Tell your audience you're seeing the doctor tomorrow, and s/he asked you to bring a stool sample with you. Wanna see it?" Then bring out your stool sample! For an added effect, put a cotton ball on top of the stool, and call it your "stool softener."
Colors of lid and stool may vary.

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Plastic Sunglasses w Clown Nose
DescriptionData.Description: Approximately 11 inches wide, assorted bright colors.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Giant plastic sunglasses with a clown nose

DescriptionData.Title: Jumbo Plastic Sunglasses
DescriptionData.Description: Approximately 11 inches wide, assorted bright colors.

DescriptionData.Title: Woochie See No Evil
DescriptionData.Description: Woochie Prosthetics are high quality, light weight appliances that deliver the most realistic effects. They are hand painted and made with FDA approved ingredients safe to use on skin.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Not recommended if allergic to latex
Not recommended for children under 8 years

DescriptionData.Title: Medical Record Gag
DescriptionData.Description: Actual 45 RPM record featuring a realistic and silly record label and sleeve designed by Clown Antics. Use as a fun prop for walkaround or in a hospital setting - "I have a doctor's appointment, and my doctor asked me to bring in my medical record." Also excellent for use as doctor or nurse character - "I have your medical record here...". Note: Prop only, the medical songs listed are not actually on record.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Record will not actually play music

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Super Stick Double Sided Tape
DescriptionData.Description: A half inch by 100 inch roll of double-sided adhesive film with great holding power. It is water resistant, ideal for sensitive skin and is not affected by freezing. Just cut it to fit your needs.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: ProKnows super stick double sided tape

DescriptionData.Title: ProKnows Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: Designed specially to work with all ProKnows noses and tips. 1 oz. size. Clean your nose or remove build-up of adhesive in your clown nose with ProKnows Dissolvent.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Designed to work with all ProKnows noses and tips
Item can't be shipped in the winter months

DescriptionData.Title: Cinema Secrets Flesh (Lt Tan) Latex Adhesive (1 oz)
DescriptionData.Description:
Cinema Secrets Flesh Latex is a natural rubber adhesive that has a tint of flesh tone, making it great for blending the edges of bald caps and other latex appliances or creating wrinkle effects on skin. 1 ounce size.
Please note that we cannot ship liquid latex items in the winter months, as freezing will damage them.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Each 1 ounce Cinema Secrets Liquid Latex will give 10 to 50 applications, depending on use You can apply dozens of prosthetics, or do 1-2 skin effects

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Adhesives Dots
DescriptionData.Description: Mehron's double-faced medical grade adhesive tape in round dots is a welcome alternative to messy glues. Their double-faced adhesive tape will keep every clown's nose in place. It goes on easy and comes off clean. 36 dots per pack.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: double-faced medical-grade adhesive tape in round dots
Goes on easy, comes off clean

DescriptionData.Title: Mehron Makeup Remover Lotion (4.5 oz)
DescriptionData.Description: A liquid makeup that helps break down creme makeup quickly and gently, leaving your skin soft! 4.5 oz. size.

DescriptionData.Title: Vanishing Cane Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: You twirl a cane between your fingers and even tap it on the floor to prove it's solid. While you hold the cane on each end, it instantaneously changes into two large silks (not included) or vanishes altogether! You will also need two (18 inch silks) or 24 inch silks to perform this effect.

DescriptionData.Title: Tootsie Pops
DescriptionData.Description: One at a time, four Tootsie Roll pops are pulled from a bag, showing four different flavors. Pick two flavors for yourself to keep and hand the bag with the remaining two to a spectator. But then? They have disappeared! Magically they are in the other bag along with your pops! Now all four are handed out for audience to enjoy! Such a massive upgrade from the old flat plastic lollipop trick! An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Includes a bag and four Tootsie Roll pops

DescriptionData.Title: Santa in the Chimney Silk Routine
DescriptionData.Description: This occupies no space but works great! Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk. Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks. The Santa vanishes into the chimney but where? Maybe he got stuck! Magically, you pull him out but he's covered in soot! And where are the gifts? They're in the bag that you showed empty before you started. This can be done your way, using thumbtips, change bag, etc. An online demonstration video makes it easier!
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Ideal for a beautiful routine in silks.
It occupies no space but plays great!
Includes a large decorated house silk and a smaller Santa silk.

DescriptionData.Title: Popcorn Dye Magic Box
DescriptionData.Description: This great utility item has so many uses. A cardboard popcorn box is shown empty. Suddenly, silks are magically produced from it! It can also be used to vanish silks or make them change color. Other small items can also be used in the box. The perfect vanish for (20th Century Silks).
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Magic item disappearing and re-appearing popcorn box

DescriptionData.Title: Egg Nest Magic Trick
DescriptionData.Description: This colorful and eye-catching trick makes a great impact - everyone likes to the chance to win something for free! Show your audience five colorful plastic Easter eggs, and slip a gold coin, dollar bill or a ring into the one of the eggs (without showing which color egg has the item). Four people are invited to reach into the bag without looking and remove an egg, and you take the last egg. Of course the egg left for you is the one with the the valuables! Also a great way to give something special to the birthday child. Directions and ideas included. Very easy to do. Need some (Silly Rings)?

DescriptionData.Title: Tote Smiley Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Smiley Switch Bag by Sam Tee. These flat, colorful change bags are perfect for many silk changes (available on the (silks page)) or vanishes. Smiley Tote is approx. 9.5" tall x 8" wide;

DescriptionData.Title: Itty Bitty Change Bags
DescriptionData.Description: The Itty Bitty is our smallest traditional change bag. Just like our larger change bags, this wood handled velvet pouched bag is large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouthcoil, or a host of other small items you can find on our (Pocket Magic) page. Assorted colors, by Ickle Pickle.
DescriptionData.BulletPoint: Large enough to hold a silver dollar, small to medium silks, a mouth coil, or other small items
